items.connect: Connect with like-minded people in your city

about_view.description: GeekPortal is a catalog of geek places for technology, gaming, science, and pop-culture enthusiasts. We help you find the best places in your city.

items.free_for_places: GeekPortal is always free for listing geek places.
items.preserve_memory: GeekPortal is created to preserve the memory of closed geek places and develop current ones.
items.find_like_minded: GeekPortal helps people find like-minded individuals.

support.title: Project Support
support.text: You can support GeekPortal by spreading the word or subscribing to the developer's Boosty:
